title: [K-12] Gamification-Based Artificial Intelligence Literacy Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of mathematics and programming concepts
context.additional_context: Gamification integration to enhance AI literacy in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can connect AI core concepts (machine learning, data processing, algorithms) to real-world cases for explanation.
Learners identify ethical issues in AI models and propose solutions through simulations provided by a gamification platform.
Learners can design mathematical problem-solving processes using AI through PBL team projects and evaluate the implementation results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
